control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.Control

  • public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the main logic of the game.
    Author:
    Dani

      • ActualizeData

        public void ActualizeData(int elapsedTime)
        ActualizeData function is recalculate every dynamic variable. Has to call it in every time stamp.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTime - Elapsed time since the last call - Sampling Time if it is a constant variable.

      • RefreshData

        public boolean RefreshData()
        This method called by the timer class, and this makes the main process of the control class.
        Returns:
        false, is the game is over.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        This function triggers the control to clear the game data, so it make the game to restart the game.
